summary: Antonio Varona of the Cuban Revolutionary Council seeks support from President Chiari of Panama to overthrow the Castro regime, but Panama denies the request to establish a training base for Cuban exiles.
title: ATTEMPT OF ANTONIO VARONA, OF CUBAN REVOLUTIONARY COUNCIL, TO OBTAIN SUPPORT OF PRESIDENT CHIARI OF PANAMA IN ACTION TO OVERTHROW CASTRO REGIME
recipient: TFW/R2 TFW PA-PROP 2 WH/PACY 1 TFW/INT 2 TFW/WAVE 1 WH/3/CR 1 TFW/FI 2 TFW/SI1 1 WH/3/P2 1 TFW/CI 2 1 TFW/PM1OS/SSD/Bauman
